title: BRIEF-Monster Beverage Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.35
text: 41 PM / in 5 minutes BRIEF-Monster Beverage Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.35 Reuters Staff Feb 28 (Reuters) - Monster Beverage Corp: * MONSTER BEVERAGE REPORTS 2017 FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.35 * Q4 NET SALES RISE 7.5 PERCENT TO $810.4 MILLION * NET SALES AND GROSS SALES IN Q4 WERE ADVERSELY AFFECTED BY INVENTORY REDUCTIONS BY CERTAIN OF COâ€˜S INTERNATIONAL DISTRIBUTORS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.37, REVENUE VIEW $843.0 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
